articles.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell says 'some pain' is on the horizon. Here's what that means

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Talk of street violence and 'semi-fascism' turns up midterm election heat
articles.description: America's political climate is hitting a late summer boiling point, as a leading GOP senator warns of street violence if Donald Trump is indicted and President Joe Biden charges that his predecessor's party is consumed by "semi-fascism."
